subject: Automobile Racing
Deaths (Obituaries)
Automobiles
lead_paragraph: The Summers brothers built a spear-like vehicle that in 1965 set the world speed record for wheel-driven cars, a record that stood for 26 years.
snippet: The Summers brothers built a spear-like vehicle that in 1965 set the world speed record for wheel-driven cars, a record that stood for 26 years.
